precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
action: Click the 'Start' button on the taskbar.

precondition: The Windows XP Start menu is open.
action: Click the 'ContrqPanel' shortcut in the Start menu.
expected_results: The Windows XP Control Panel window will open.

precondition: The Control Panel is open in Category View.
action: Move the mouse cursor to the "Display" Control Panel icon.
expected_results: The "Display" Control Panel icon will become highlighted.

precondition: The "Appearance and Themes" category is open in the Control Panel.
action: Click the Control Panel icon labeled "splay".

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Themes" tab is selected.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" window will now show the "Screen Saver" tab's options.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
action: Click on the dropdown arrow next to the 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: A list of screen saver options will appear, with the current selection displayed.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu in the "Display Properties" window is open.
action: Click the "[None]" menu item in the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu will close and "[None]" will be displayed as the selected screen saver.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active. The "Power" button is visible in the "Monitor power" section.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open, displaying the "Power Schemes" tab. The "Home/Office Desk" power scheme will be selected by default.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The "System hibernates" dropdown menu, located within the "Settings for Home/Office Desk power scheme" section, should have a visible dropdown arrow.
action: Click the dropdown arrow to the right of the "System hibernates" option.
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear, displaying a list of time options for the "System hibernates" setting.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active. The "System hibernates" dropdown menu should be available and visible.
action: Click on the "After 5 hours" item within the "System hibernates" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "System hibernates" dropdown menu will display "After 5 hours" as the selected option.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active.
action: Click the dropdown arrow next to the "Power schemes" listbox.
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear, displaying a list of available power schemes.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active.
action: Click the "Power schemes" dropdown menu and select "Always On".
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will update to reflect the "Always On" power scheme settings.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active. The "Always On" power scheme is selected.
action: Click the dropdown button labeled "Turn off hard disks:" within the "Settings for Always On power scheme" section.
expected_results: A dropdown menu with a list of time options will appear, allowing you to adjust the time delay before the hard drive enters power saving mode.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Always On" power scheme is selected.
action: Click the dropdown button for the "Turn off monitor" option.
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear with a list of time interval options ranging from "After 1 min" to "Never".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active. The "System hibernates" dropdown menu is expanded.
action: Click the "Never" item in the "System hibernates" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "System hibernates" dropdown menu will show "Never" as the selected option.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open with the 'Cancel' button visible.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will close. The 'Display Properties' window will remain open.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open, showing the "Screen Saver" tab.
action: Click the "OK" button at the bottom of the window.

precondition: The "Appearance and Themes" window is open in the Windows XP Control Panel.
action: Click the close button in the top right corner of the "Appearance and Themes" window.
expected_results: The "Appearance and Themes" window will close.
